thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com
thread.title: Shellie Bledsoe

author: Shellie Bledsoe
title: Shellie Bledsoe
text: I have to have the intoxalock device installed on my vehicle which is quite embarrassing and has caused me a lot of grief and humiliation. I called to set the install up and Gaige was the representative. He walked me through the process and he was able to answer all my questions and the concerns I had regarding the installation, in addition, the amount of money this has cost me he was able to same me money which I greatly appreciate.
